textBeforeTable: 2) What is your congregation's denominational affiliation if any? (DENOM1) 1) ID  Unique ID number to aggregate data by congregation. Cases starting with an F are from the Fast Growing Presbyterian Leaders oversample. Cases starting with a P are from the Presbyterian random sample. And cases starting with a V are from Presbyterian surveys collected after the original random sample and oversample. These congregations asked to participate in the survey.
